Detailed Description

The application class is the main body of the program. It will create an instance of the graphics engine and execute the Update/Render cycle.

Member Typedef Documentation

Creates an instance of the graphics engine and network engine

Member Function Documentation

bool Application::Init (   )  [private]
 

Initialises the graphics system It should also initialise the network system

bool Application::Loop (   )  [static, private]
 

Main game loop

Processes user input events Supposed to process network events Renders the ships

This is a static function that is called by the graphics engine every frame, hence the need to loop through the global namespace to find itself.

void Application::Render (   ) 
 

Render Cycle

Clear the screen and render all the ships

void Application::Shutdown (   )  [private]
 

Shuts down the graphics and network system

void Application::Start (   ) 
 

Kick starts the everything, called from main.

bool Application::Update (   ) 
 

Update cycle

Checks for keypresses:

  • Esc - Quits the game
  • Left - Rotates ship left
  • Right - Rotates ship right
  • Up - Accelerates the ship
  • Down - Deccelerates the ship

Also calls Update() on all the ships in the universe
